Home.title: wal-bookmark
Home.tagLine: Professional Sui Blockchain Object Management Tool
Home.description: Search, bookmark, and manage your Sui objects with smart bookmark categorization and convenient editing features.
Home.heroDescription: Professional Sui blockchain object management tool. Search, bookmark, and manage your Sui objects, supporting smart bookmark categorization and convenient editing features.
Home.coreFeaturesSubtitle: Object management solution designed specifically for Sui blockchain
Home.smartSearchDescription: Quickly search for objects on the Sui blockchain with multiple filter conditions to help you accurately locate target objects.
Home.bookmarkManagementDescription: One-click to bookmark important objects, supporting categorized management and quick access for more organized object management.
Home.convenientEditingDescription: Support object information editing and note addition, custom tags and descriptions for more complete object information.
Home.dataPersistenceDescription: Secure data storage based on Supabase ensures your bookmark data is safe, reliable, and accessible anytime, anywhere.
Home.secureAndReliableDescription: Adopts modern security standards to protect your data and privacy, allowing you to use all features with peace of mind.
Home.highPerformanceDescription: Built with Next.js 15 for fast search response and smooth user experience.
Home.startManagingYourSuiObjectsSubtitle: Experience professional Sui blockchain object management tools for simple and efficient object management
